options.name: Beginner Druid
options.description: You can research Beginner Level Druidic Spells and gain +1 Power.

options.name: Reaction : Balanced Elements
options.description: In response to taking Elemental Damage, reduce the amount you take by [Level]d4

options.name: Novice Druid
options.description: You can research Novice Level Druidic Spells, gain +1 Spell Attack and +2 Power.

options.name: Speak with Animals
options.description: Gain the Sylvan Language, allowing you to communicate basic ideas to animals.

options.name: Journeyman Druid
options.description: You can research Journeyman Level Druidic Spells, gain +5 Power and +1 Elemental Mitigation

options.name: Free Action : Beast Conduit
options.description: The next Spell you Channel this turn can use a non-hostile Beast within 10 Units as the point of origin.

options.name: Natural Armor
options.description: While you are wearing Light or no Armor, you gain +2 Physical Mitigation and +1 Block

options.name: Expert Druid
options.description: You can research Expert Level Druidic Spells, gain +8 Power, +1 Spell Attack and +1 Spell Damage

options.name: Spirit of Nature
options.description: Gain +1 Movement Speed, +1 Search and +1 Initiative

options.name: Innate Regeneration
options.description: When you complete a Full Rest, you regenerate all your Health, remove any conditions that are affecting you and regenerate any missing limbs. Any Creature who completes a Full Rest inside your Grove benefits from this as well.

options.name: Master Druid
options.description: You can research Master Level Druidic Spells, gain +10 Power, +1 Spell Attack and +1 Resistance. Additionally, you can research or learn Grand Master Druidic Spells at level 13.
